definition: not aware of or concerned about what is happening around one
sentence: She was oblivious to the chaos around her as she focused on her book.

definition: mutual trust and friendship among people who spend a lot of time together
sentence: The camaraderie among the team members was evident during the celebration.
Her ebullient personality made her the life of the party.

definition: intended for or likely to be understood by only a small number of people with a specialized knowledge
sentence: The lecture on quantum mechanics contained many esoteric concepts.

definition: a mode of behavior or way of thought peculiar to an individual
sentence: His idiosyncrasy of wearing mismatched socks became his trademark.

definition: having a ready insight into and understanding of things
sentence: The perspicacious detective quickly uncovered the truth.

definition: a person or thing that is the direct opposite of someone or something else
sentence: He was the antithesis of his brother, who was shy and reserved.

definition: pertaining to a harsh discordant mixture of sounds
sentence: The cacophonic sounds of the construction site were unbearable.
The pulchritude of the landscape took her breath away.

definition: a person who is new to a subject, skill, or belief
sentence: As a neophyte in the art world, she felt overwhelmed by the galleries.
